name: No Title but u kill zombies
name_original: No Title but u kill zombies
description: Done in 1.34 day(s?) with my friend Edouard depoilly with stolen assets from the internet. We forgot to put an end, so imagine that you will be killed if zombies touch you. You can change weapon with your mouse wheel, and you can switch side with spacebar. Actually the game is pretty funny so you can give it a try, sad that Flash died of ligma...
